channel.title: Forums, Connection Problems Sorry, SMF was unable to connect to the database
channel.description:
PLease someone help me to back my forums, My Forums is Smf Forums Please Explain How. Hosted on. 000webhost.com ..
Thanks for help.

item.title: Forums, Connection Problems Sorry, SMF was unable to connect to the database
item.dc:creator: @Skill_3D Skill 3D
item.description:
@Skill_3D wrote:

It isn’t connecting to the database, either the database doesn’t exist or you typed something wrong somewhere. On the 000webhost control panel it should give you information somewhere on what to input for that. If you give the exact error I would be able to help you a bit more.

Read full topic
